author: mcconnell
msg: A few minor updates to sources across avalon to eliminate javadoc warnings. Secondly, updates to the javadoc task to enable a parameterized title.

author: mcconnell
msg: Update the home to check for AVALON_HOME when resolving the repository - and update the JavadocTask with assorted goodies.

author: crossley
msg: Enable a user project to define a local OASIS Catalog
to resolve their own DTDs to local copies.
The CatalogManager.properties defines their catalog.xcat and needs to be
avaliable to the classpath when Cocoon starts.

author: mcconnell
msg: add hello and dynamics (need to think about how a seperate index for tutorials could be managed)

author: mcconnell
msg: bring hello and dynamics up to speed with a little bit of magic
